tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_sources (
  media_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  media_name VARCHAR(255),
  media_type VARCHAR(50),
  credibility_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE MediaMetadata (
  metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_id INT,
  rating_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES MediaSources(source_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (rating_id) REFERENCES CredibilityRatings(rating_id)
);

CREATE TABLE source_ratings (
    source_rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating_value DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES media_sources(source_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (rating_id) REFERENCES credibility_ratings(rating_id)
);

CREATE TABLE source_categories (
    source_category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    category_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES media_sources(source_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES media_categories(category_id)
);
